name: merge topic and payload
func:

name: format heartbeat message
func:

return msg;

func:
matrix = msg.payload
var generations = []
generations.push( matrix)
flow.set ("saved", matrix)
flow.set ("generation", 0)
flow.set ("generations", generations)
flow.set ("period", 0)
return msg;

Get Indexed Matrix

func:

saved.push(msg.payload)

name: Append to savedMatrices
func:
// array is in the message payload
var savedMatrices = msg.payload || []
node.trace("isArray: " + savedMatrices.isArray)
node.trace("savedMatrices:" + savedMatrices)
node.trace("msg.payload:" + msg.payload)
var saved = flow.get("saved") || []
savedMatrices.push( saved)
msg.payload = savedMatrices
return msg

temp F
func:
var temp = msg.payload.temperature.value
flow.set ("temperature", temp)
temp = 9/5 * temp + 32
temp = Math.floor( 10 *temp) / 10
temp = "" + temp + "F"
msg.payload = temp
return msg;

name: dewpt F
func:
var temp = msg.payload.dewpoint.value
flow.set( "dewpoint", temp)
temp = 9/5 * temp + 32
temp = Math.floor( 10 *temp) / 10
temp = "" + temp + "F"
msg.payload = temp
return msg;
